QuestEditor.Title: Quest Editor
QuestEditor.Name: Quest Name
QuestEditor.SummaryHint: Short description shown in quest lists
QuestEditor.HiddenHint: Quest is not visible to players until revealed
QuestEditor.PinnedHint: Quest appears at the top of quest lists
QuestEditor.TurnInActorHint: Leave empty to use the quest giver for turn-in
QuestEditor.ConsumeItemsHint: Remove collected items from player inventory when quest completes
QuestEditor.ItemUUIDHint: Enter the UUID of an item from the game or a compendium
QuestEditor.CompanionRewardHint: Actor who joins the party as a companion
QuestEditor.PropertyRewardHint: Scene that becomes the party's property
QuestEditor.MinimumLevelHint: Set to 0 for no level requirement
QuestEditor.RequiredQuestsHint: Quests that must be completed before this one is available
QuestEditor.RequiredGoldHint: Gold players must have (not spent) to accept the quest
QuestEditor.DisplayPrerequisitesHint: How the quest appears when prerequisites are not met
QuestEditor.RepeatableEnabledHint: Allow this quest to be completed multiple times
QuestEditor.TimeLimitHint: Hours to complete the quest after accepting. Leave empty for no limit.
QuestEditor.OnGiverDeathHint: What happens if the quest giver dies while quest is active
QuestEditor.AllowAbandonmentHint: Allow players to abandon this quest
QuestEditor.AbandonCooldownHint: Days before the quest can be accepted again after abandoning
QuestEditor.ConflictsWithHint: These quests will fail when this quest is completed
QuestEditor.MutuallyExclusiveHint: Cannot be active at the same time as these quests
QuestEditor.PartyNotesHint: Notes visible to the entire party
QuestEditor.DeleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This cannot be undone.

FactionEditor.Title: Faction Editor
FactionEditor.Name: Faction Name
FactionEditor.ShortDescriptionHint: One-line description shown in faction lists
FactionEditor.HQSceneHint: Scene UUID where faction headquarters is located
FactionEditor.SpecialDialogueHint: NPCs at headquarters use special dialogue options
FactionEditor.RanksHint: Define progression ranks for faction members
FactionEditor.ResetRanksContent: This will replace all custom ranks with the default rank progression. Continue?
FactionEditor.RelationshipsHint: Define how this faction relates to others
FactionEditor.ReputationEffectHint: Multiplier for reputation changes (e.g., -0.5 means losing rep here)
FactionEditor.EnemyDescription: Hostile faction, reputation is inversely affected
FactionEditor.EnableDecayHint: Reputation slowly decreases over time if inactive
FactionEditor.UseDefaultRanksHint: Use the standard copper-to-mythril rank progression
FactionEditor.DeleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This cannot be undone.

NPCConfig.Title: NPC Configuration

General.Title: General Settings
General.EnableModuleHint: Enable Bob's Talking NPCs features for this NPC
General.DisplayNameHint: Custom name to show in dialogues (leave blank to use actor name)
General.Title: Title
General.TitleHint: Optional title or epithet (e.g., 'Captain of the Guard')
General.LocationHint: Where this NPC can typically be found
General.PersonalityTraitsHint: Keywords describing personality for AI-generated dialogue

NPCConfig.RolesHint: Select the roles this NPC can perform
NPCConfig.ScheduleHint: Define when this NPC is available
NPCConfig.NoSchedule: No schedule entries. NPC is always available.
NPCConfig.ServicesHint: Configure services this NPC can provide
NPCConfig.AppearanceHint: Customize how this NPC appears in dialogues
NPCConfig.VoiceStyleHint: Text styling for dialogue (e.g., gruff, formal, cheerful)
NPCConfig.EnableModuleHint: Enable Bob's Talking NPCs features for this NPC
NPCConfig.PrimaryRoleHint: The main function this NPC serves
NPCConfig.TagsHint: Comma-separated tags for filtering and organization

RoleDescription.Merchant: This NPC can buy and sell items to players
RoleDescription.QuestGiver: This NPC can offer quests to players
RoleDescription.QuestTurnIn: This NPC can accept completed quests
RoleDescription.StableMaster: This NPC manages mount storage and sales
RoleDescription.Innkeeper: This NPC provides lodging and meals
RoleDescription.Trainer: This NPC can train skills or abilities
RoleDescription.Transporter: This NPC offers fast travel services
RoleDescription.Informant: This NPC provides rumors and information
RoleDescription.HirelingRecruiter: This NPC recruits hirelings for the party

NPCConfig.EnableScheduleHint: When enabled, this NPC follows a daily schedule
NPCConfig.MarkupHint: Percentage markup on base prices (100% = normal)
NPCConfig.SkillsPlaceholder: Select skills this NPC can train...
NPCConfig.RoomPriceHint: Price per night in gold pieces
NPCConfig.FenceMarkupHint: Percentage of item value paid for stolen goods
NPCConfig.PortraitHint: Image shown during dialogue with this NPC
NPCConfig.IndicatorHint: Visual indicator shown on the NPC token
NPCConfig.ShowTitleHint: Display the NPC's title alongside their name
NPCConfig.NoQuestsAssigned: No quests assigned to this NPC

Merchant.Description: This NPC can buy and sell items to players

QuestTurnIn.Description: This NPC can accept completed quests

Informant.Description: This NPC provides rumors and information

HirelingRecruiter.Description: This NPC recruits hirelings for the party

Guard.Description: This NPC patrols and enforces the law
